<p><font size="3" face="Verdana">QuTiP is an open source framework designed for solving the dynamics of open quantum systems.  QuTiP may be thought of as an open source alternative to the popular, but aging, <a href="http://www.qo.phy.auckland.ac.nz/qotoolbox.html">Quantum Optics Toolbox</a> (qotoolbox), although we do not aim to be in one-to-one correspondence.*</font><p>
